trans-unit.source: Exposes the common properties of data-bound-controls that display multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 公开显示多行的数据绑定控件的通用属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the names of the data fields whose values are appended to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> property value to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据字段的名称，这些数据字段的值附加到 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> 属性值，以便唯一标识数据绑定控件的每个实例。

trans-unit.source: An array of data field names.
Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> objects that represent the data key value of each row in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 对象的集合，这些对象表示数据绑定控件中每行的数据键值。

trans-unit.source: A collection of data-key objects that contains the data-key value of each row in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 数据键对象的集合，这些对象包含数据绑定控件中每行的数据键值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the selection of a row is based on index or on data-key values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示行的选择是基于索引还是数据键值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row selection is based on data-key values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果行选择基于数据键值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that contains the data-key value for the selected row in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，其中包含数据绑定控件中所选行的数据键值。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the data-key value for the selected row in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，其中包含数据绑定控件中所选行的数据键值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the selected row in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据绑定控件中所选行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the selected row in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件中所选行的索引。
